root.name: Dark
root.description: OverviewDARK is a stealth-action game mixed in with RPG elements set in a modern vampire world developed by German-based studio Realmforge. Using a stylized cel-shaded look, you play as Eric Bane, newly minted vampire who wakes up at a vampire-controlled bar with no memory of how he became one.Bane must use the shadows and his upgradeable vampire skills (such as a teleport move that allows him to get to an enemy instantly and use a brutal finishing move) to survive.System RequirementsMinimumOS:Windows XP SP2Processor:2.0 GHz Dual CoreMemory:2 GB RAMGraphics:NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT / ATI Radeon HD 4670 / Intel HD Graphics 4000, with 512 MB dedicated RAMHard Drive:5 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX compatible sound card
